tool_description: Parses and structures raw incident report data from various file formats into standardized fields for analysis.

file_path.description: Path to the incident report file (CSV, Excel, or JSON format)

file_format.description: Format of the input file: csv, excel, or json

date_column.description: Name of the column containing incident dates

description_column.description: Name of the column containing incident descriptions

location_column.description: Name of the column containing incident locations

error_messages: File not found: Verify that the file_path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported file format: Use csv, excel, or json only.
Missing required column: Ensure date_column and description_column exist in the file.
Invalid date format: Dates must be in recognizable format (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).
Empty file: The input file contains no data records.
usage: Provide file_path, file_format, date_column, and description_column. Optionally specify location_column if available. The tool returns structured incident data ready for analysis.

total_records.description: Total number of incident records parsed

parsed_incidents.description: Array of structured incident record identifiers

date_range.description: Date range of incidents in the dataset
